entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Implement Read short, int, long and their unsigned versions to stream #110944
  • where `DISABLE_ASSERT_MESSAGES` defined #110941
  • [WASM] MarshalingPInvokeScanner fails when using a nested value type contained in a different assembly. #110938
  • Test failure: tracing/eventpipe/processenvironment/processenvironment/processenvironment.cmd #110933

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Supporting collection expression `[]` for empty `ReadOnlyCollection<T>.Empty` #110942
  • `JsonSerializerContext` in System.Text.Json doesn't support the same inheritor class name in different namespaces #110931
  • how set trace level in wasmbrowser #110928

PullRequests

Created

  • System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException thrown on a retrieval of derived attribute with overridden property getter #110945
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • fix browser-wasm debug build #110943
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution

Updated

  • Fix alignment padding and add test for saving managed resources #110915
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Exit the lock before we call into user code and handle losing the race for the RCW table #110828
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add lock in ValidateName #110780
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Move ComWrappers AddRef to C/C++ #110815
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • Refactor use of `FastAllocateString` #110929
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Safer stackallocs #110864
    area-Meta
  • [JIT] [APX] Enable additional General Purpose Registers. #108799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx, 10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

PullRequests

    Area-IDE, Community

    Area-IDE, Community, VSCode
  • Add F1 test for scoped #64094
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: fortunes, updates #59640
  • SignalR client cannot connect to SignalR server #59639
  • UsePathBase should insert before UseRouting() in WebApplicationBuilder.ConfigureApplication #59638

Closed

  • Perf improvement: mTls-handshakes-kestrel, updates #59627
  • Perf regression: json #59623

PullRequests

Updated

  • [release/9.0] Fix loading dotnet user-jwts config #59473
    Servicing-approved, area-commandlinetools, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0.x
  • More thorough support for retrieving OpenAPI routes in a case-sensitive manner #59568
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Consume `M.A.App.Internal.Assets` from the SDK during source build #59526
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Poor Collection View Performance and Incorrect Layout #26813
  • I initially created "Loading initial data from a json file of data 4000 in ObservableCollection is lagging the application to start" #24677 (https://github.com/dotnet/maui/issues/24677) but its locked. #26812
  • [MAUI]I9_ Scrolling- Try scrolling down and when new items are added the first item does not kept in the displayed list. #26810
  • XAML StaticResource #26808

Closed

  • App crash only on iOS after successful WebAuthenticator callback via Universal App Link. #26814
  • TabbedPage + Data Template will crash on switching tab #26811
  • .NET Maui Hybrid with Android Emulator cannot rebuild after a deployment to the emulator #26809

PullRequests

Merged

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 61 #26761
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 52 #26674
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 60 #26755
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr2] [Windows] Fix titlebar not being added to modals #26794
    .NET 9 SR2.2

Updated

  • Fix for Setting Window.TitleBar to null does not remove the customization  #26568
    community ✨, area-controls-titlebar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Flyout Items Not Displayed in RightToLeft FlowDirection in Landscape - fix #26762
    area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨
  • Implementation of Customizable Search Button Color for SearchBar Across Platforms #26759
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix up relevant CA1416 warnings - Set 1 #26696
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix up relevant CA1416 warnings - Set 3 #26751
    community ✨, area-controls-image, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fix up relevant CA1416 warnings - Set 2 #26724
    community ✨, area-controls-checkbox, partner/syncfusion
  • Change iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation mechanism #26629
    area-layout, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 62 #26805
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 63 #26806
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
